question: What is the meaning of the phrase "the world's longest undefended border"?
possible_answers: A. Canada exports billions of dollars' worth of energy products to the USA.
B. Canada enjoys close relations with the United States.
C. Over three-quarters of Canadian exports are destined for the USA.
D. Millions of Canadians and Americans cross the border every year in safety.
main_question: What is the meaning of the phrase "the world's longest undefended border"?
answer: D. Millions of Canadians and Americans cross the border every year in safety.
explanatory_sentence: Millions of Canadians and Americans cross every year and in safety what is traditionally known as "the world's longest undefended border."
